# location

**Instance Property**

The map item that contains the point of interest’s geographical information.

## Declaration

```swift
var location: MKMapItem { get set }
```

## Managing the Map Annotation

- **pinImage**: A custom image that the map annotation displays.

items.description: A custom image that the map annotation displays.
